description: This Java configuration class defines OpenAPI metadata for a Spring Boot application, setting up API info, tags, contact info, license, and external documentation for API documentation purposes.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that creates an OpenAPI bean to provide API documentation metadata for the Notes App backend.

methods.name: notesOpenAPI
methods.description: Bean method that constructs and returns an OpenAPI object with application-specific info, tags, contact, license, and external documentation.
